text: Michel Debidour (born 1947) is a French historian and archaeologist. Debidour joined the École Normale Supérieure in 1966, and he obtained his Agrégation de Lettres classiques in 1970. From 1972 to 1977 Debidour was a member of the French School at Athens. Debidour's research focuses on the history and economy of Greek cities, the history of technology and cryptography. He also is a specialist of the amphora stamps of Thasos. == Other websites == * Debidour (Michel), Les Grecs et la guerre, Ve-IVe siècles, De la guerre rituelle à la guerre totale * Michel Laferrere, Victor-Henry et Michel Debidour, Lyon et ses environs * La Grèce De Michel Debidour Category:French archaeologists Category:1947 births Category:Living people
